## SimpleProduct interface

A simple product is tangible and are usually sold as single units or in fixed quantities.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SimpleProduct extends CustomizableProductInterface, PhysicalProductInterface, ProductInterface 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [CustomizableProductInterface](./magento-api.customizableproductinterface.md)<!-- -->, [PhysicalProductInterface](./magento-api.physicalproductinterface.md)<!-- -->, [ProductInterface](./magento-api.productinterface.md)
